app_detail:
Uplift is the best stock market app to track US stocks and stay on top of the global stock markets. 

You can watch your portfolio, track the latest prices, get stock alerts, and follow the major stock exchanges. You can also set price notifications -- when a stock you're watching reaches your target price you'll get a price alert ğŸ‘

A stock market app for beginners, traders, or investors of all kinds. Uplift is a stocks tracker that will let you watch stocks and follow the market, or just your portfolio.

Supports the NASDAQ, New York Stock Exchange (NYSE), S&P 500, Dow Jones, Russell 2000, and all major US stock exchanges. 

Top features
â˜… Real-time stock quotes, easy to track portfolios, and up-to-the-minute data to help you stay on top of the markets

â˜… Build your own portfolio and monitor your favorite stocks, indexes, mutual funds, and ETFs

â˜… Set alerts and get push notifications for stocks on your watch list

â˜… Multiple portfolios to keep track of your investments

â˜… Financial data including open price, close price, daily high/low, 52-week high/low, gain/loss, aftermarket and premarket, end-of-day quote, EPS, P/E ratio, dividend, and dividend yield

â˜… Stock charts and including daily and intraday charts, plus weekly, monthly, and yearly historical charts

â˜… Advanced features including ROA, ROE, cash flow including FCF and OCF per share, revenue growth, P/B, asset turnover, leverage, stocks tracker, forward P/E, and PEG ratio

Investing and monitoring the financial markets doesn't have to be hard! Whether you're looking to buy, sell, or just keep track of your portfolio, Uplift will help you get stock quotes and stock alerts to react to market news in real time.

Supports thousands of stock tickers and companies. 

Questions or comments? Let us know: uplifthelp@gmail.com. We aim to be the best stock market app for Android ğŸš€
